p: The alignment shows that amongst the seven M pro protein sequences identical with BAT SARS-CoV, four sequences are from different Human Coronaviruses isolates, one from MERS CoV and one from BAT SARS CoV isolate. Notably, the 2019-nCoV of M pro is identical (100%) with BAT SARS-CoV and distantly related (âˆ¼34%) to Human Coronavirus, 229E ( Figure 1A). Results suggest that M pro of 2019-nCoV was evolved from BAT SARS-CoV.
